quotes.quote: Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, 'Would an idiot do that?' and if they would, I do not do that thing.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: I knew exactly what to do. But in a much more real sense, I had no idea what to do.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: Sometimes I'll start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way. Like an improv conversation.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: One day Michael came in and complained about a speed bump on the highway...I wonder who he ran over then.
quotes.author: Jim Halpert

quotes.quote: I wish there was a way to know you're in the good old days before you've actually left them.
quotes.author: Andy Bernard

quotes.quote: I talk a lot, so I've learned to just tune myself out...
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor

quotes.quote: Sorry I annoyed you with my friendship.
quotes.author: Andy Bernard

quotes.quote: I'm not superstitious...but I'm a little stitious.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: If I don't have some cake soon, I might die.
quotes.author: Stanley Hudson

quotes.quote: I am faster than 80 percent of all snakes.
quotes.author: Dwight Schrute

quotes.quote: I'm an early bird and I'm a night owl. So I'm wise, and I have worms.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: I consider myself a good person...but I'm gonna try to make him cry.
quotes.author: Oscar Martinez

quotes.quote: The worst thing about prison was the Dementors.
quotes.author: Prison Mike

quotes.quote: Sometimes I get so bored, I just want to scream. And then sometimes, I actually do scream. I just sort of feel out what the situation calls for.
quotes.author: Kelly Kapoor
